content: get organized in style with this spike stitch crochet basket pattern featuring a removable divider this beginner-friendly and functional design is perfect for storing your yarn hooks and crochet notions in separate sections keeping your crafting space tidy and beautiful this digital pdf pattern includes detailed instructions and links to 3 step-by-step video tutorials to help you master the spike stitch and assemble the clever divider insert you ll use mary maxim titan yarn bulky for structure and mary maxim prism yarn dk for a pop of color hook size 5 5mm originally featured as a mystery cal this pattern also includes crochet tips throughout to help you improve your skills as you go whether you re making it for yourself or gifting it to a fellow maker this basket is both pretty and practical skill level easy/beginner finished size fits yarn balls hooks notions comfortably includes 3 video tutorials yarn bulky + dk mary maxim titan & prism yarn perfect for crochet storage craft room decor gifts for crocheters market prep and more the pattern is free with ads on my website 2 > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/spike-crochet-basket-pattern-removable-divider/
